A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was there in 1977\, and have been hooked ever since. I wasn't all that pleased with the prequels\, but the sequel trilogy is turning out to be a lot of fun to watch. I went in to see The Last Jedi with the same enthusiasm I usually go in with\, but I was beyond surprised. This one made me feel like that eight year old again. So many thrills and surprises\, even for me\, a spoiler hound. I loved this movie! It may be my most favorite of all.
